mainBoard.name: Soltari Foot Soldier
mainBoard.originalText: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

rulings.text: If an attacking creature has multiple evasion abilities, such as shadow and flying, a creature can block it only if that creature satisfies all of the appropriate evasion abilities.
Multiple instances of shadow on the same creature are redundant.
Once a creature has been blocked, that creature remains blocked and will deal and be dealt combat damage even if it gains or loses shadow or if the blocking creature gains or loses shadow.

Rückkauf- Opfere ein Land.

mainBoard.name: Pegasus Stampede
mainBoard.originalText:
Buyback—
Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs when you play this spell. If you do, put Pegasus Stampede into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Put a Pegasus token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 white creature with flying.
mainBoard.text:
Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

foreignData.name: Himmelshabicht
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Himmelshabicht aus dem Spiel auf dem Friedhof landet, kannst Du Deine Bibliothek nach einer Himmelshabichtkarte durchsuchen, diese Karte allen Spielern zeigen und sie auf Deine Hand nehmen. Mische Deine Bibliothek danach neu.

mainBoard.name: Welkin Hawk
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
If Welkin Hawk is put into any graveyard from play, you may search your library for a Welkin Hawk card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.

rulings.text: You do not have to find a Welkin Hawk card if you do not want to.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

mainBoard.name: Soltari Visionary
mainBoard.originalText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
If Soltari Visionary damages any player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

rulings.text: If the damaged player controls any enchantments, you must choose one to be destroyed. If they do not, nothing happens.
If an attacking creature has multiple evasion abilities, such as shadow and flying, a creature can block it only if that creature satisfies all of the appropriate evasion abilities.
Multiple instances of shadow on the same creature are redundant.
Once a creature has been blocked, that creature remains blocked and will deal and be dealt combat damage even if it gains or loses shadow or if the blocking creature gains or loses shadow.

mainBoard.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

foreignData.name: Netzmauer
foreignData.text:
Entferne am Ende des Kampfes alle Kreaturen, die von der Netzmauer geblockt wurden, ganz aus dem Spiel.
Bringe alle Kreaturen, die von der Netzmauer aus dem Spiel entfernt wurden, unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers wieder ins Spiel, wenn die Netzmauer das Spiel verlässt.

mainBoard.name: Wall of Nets
mainBoard.originalText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
At end of combat, remove from the game all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets.
If Wall of Nets leaves play, return to play under their owners' control all creatures removed from the game with Wall of Nets.

rulings.text: It only exiles creatures if this card is still on the battlefield at the end of combat.

mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
At end of combat, exile all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets.
When Wall of Nets leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Wall of Nets to the battlefield under their owners' control.

mainBoard.flavorText: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

foreignData.text: Opfere eine Kreatur: Die Goblin-Bombardierung fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Bombardment
mainBoard.originalText: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Eingeschränkte Reserven
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Eingeschränkten Reserven ins Spiel kommen, bestimmt jeder Spieler fünf Länder, die er kontrolliert, und opfert die übrigen Länder.
Solange zehn oder mehr Länder im Spiel sind, können Spieler keine Länder ausspielen.

mainBoard.name: Limited Resources
mainBoard.originalText:
When Limited Resources comes into play, each player chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest.
As long as there are ten or more lands in play, players cannot play lands.

rulings.text: If a player has less than 5 lands, they get to pick and keep all of their lands.
The sacrificed lands are chosen during resolution. The current player chooses first.
You can put lands onto the battlefield using effects, you just can’t play lands from your hand as an action.

mainBoard.text:
When Limited Resources enters, each player chooses five lands they control and sacrifices the rest.
Players can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.

mainBoard.flavorText: The last thing to go through the mogg's mind was its teeth.

foreignData.name: Anschlag
foreignData.text: Immer wenn Du erfolgreich einen Kreaturenzauber sprichst, tappe eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl.

mainBoard.name: Onslaught
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you successfully cast a creature spell, tap target creature.

rulings.text: Can target an already tapped creature.
The ability is not optional. If you have the only targetable creatures, you have to tap one of your own.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, tap target creature.

foreignData.name: Aufklärung
foreignData.text: 0: Enttappe eine angreifende Kreatur Deiner Wahl, die Du kontrollierst, und entferne sie aus dem Kampf. (Diese Kreatur erhält in diesem Zug keinen Kampfschaden und teilt auch keinen aus.)

mainBoard.name: Reconnaissance
mainBoard.originalText: o0: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat and untap it. (That creature neither deals nor receives combat damage this turn.)

rulings.text: Does not undo any effects which triggered on declaration of attackers or blockers.

mainBoard.text: {0}: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat and untap it. (If you activate during end of combat, the creature will untap after it deals combat damage.)

mainBoard.name: Sonic Burst
mainBoard.originalText: Discard a card at random: Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: You can’t discard more than once to target more than one creature (or player) or to do multiple amounts of damage to a single creature (or player).
You pick the target before you know which card is going to be discarded.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random.
Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

foreignData.name: Anfachen
foreignData.text: Das Anfachen fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Schadenspunkte in Höhe von 2 plus der Anzahl an Anfachen-Karten in allen Friedhöfen zu.

mainBoard.name: Kindle
mainBoard.originalText: Kindle deals to target creature or player an amount of damage equal to 2 plus the number of Kindle cards in all graveyards.

rulings.text: Because Kindle is still on the stack as you perform its instructions, it isn't in your graveyard and won't add to the amount of damage dealt.

mainBoard.text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I don't need a plan, just a goal. The rest will follow on its own."
—Gerrard

foreignData.name: Abhärtung
foreignData.text: Verhindere bis zu X Schadenspunkte bei einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Lege für jeden Schadenspunkt, der auf diese Art verhindert wurde, eine +1/+1 Marke auf diese Kreatur.

mainBoard.name: Temper
mainBoard.originalText: Prevent up to X damage to target creature. For each 1 damage prevented in this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

rulings.text: The +1/+1 counters do show up at the same time as any unprevented damage, which means they are there before you check for lethal damage.
You can make X be larger than the amount of damage, but you only get one counter for each actual point of damage prevented.

mainBoard.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
